description: This file declares functions related to subscribing, unsubscribing, and closing rbus value change events in the CCSP (Common Controller Software Platform) component. It primarily contains function prototypes and type definitions for managing value change notifications via rbus in a C environment.

methods.name: Ccsp_RbusValueChange_Subscribe
methods.description: Subscribes to rbus value change notifications for a specified parameter.

methods.name: Ccsp_RbusValueChange_Unsubscribe
methods.description: Unsubscribes from rbus value change notifications for a specified parameter.

methods.name: Ccsp_RbusValueChange_Close
methods.description: Closes the rbus value change handle, terminating any ongoing subscriptions.

calls: rbus/rbuscore_message.h (likely functions within the included header)
